name: Uraeus
description: The Uraeus is a tiny celestial creature with the ability to fly and a distinct venomous bite. It possesses unique fire-based attacks.
memorable: The Uraeus can absorb damage meant for its allies, making it a valuable protector in combat.
goals: To protect its allies and support them in battle.
relations: May be encountered alongside celestial beings or as a guardian of divine spaces.
environment: Typically found in celestial or otherworldly realms.
strengths: High mobility with Flyby ability and significant resistances to fire and poison.
weaknesses: Low strength and charisma scores limit it in physical contests and social situations.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing and poison damage, and a powerful ranged attack with fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Searing Breath, which deals fire damage in a cone and affects multiple creatures.
senses: Blindsight of 10 feet aids in detecting creatures without sight.
skills: Good perception skill with a +4 bonus for detecting hidden dangers.
additional_information: Immune to fire and poison damage.
Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Can bond with other creatures to share health information.
Can use its breath weapon in a cone for area damage.
Effects of its poison can cause additional fire damage over time.
test_queries: tiny celestial creature with fiery breath
protective tiny celestial to absorb damage
venomous bite and fire attacks celestial
skirmisher that flies and casts magic
